casebody.data:
State
v.
Avenger Ridgeway 375P09-6 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016

Mr. Avenger Ridgeway, Pro se.

Ms. Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mr. Jon David, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of May 2016 by Defendant for Request to Order Public Records:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
